headline: Private Credit Is On Course for Biggest Year in Emerging Markets
summary: Funding by the likes of Blackstone Inc. and Apollo Global Management Inc. is putting EM deals from private lenders on course for the biggest year on record.  The first half of 2025 saw $11.7 billion deployed, already nearly reaching 2024’s full-year total, according to the Global Private Capital Association.  This year has included the biggest private deals to date in India, Southeast Asia and Eastern Europe, adding to strong growth in the Gulf.
